name: Ipwhere
body:
# [ipwhere](http://dolfly.github.com/ipwhere/)
=======
***

unix/linux shell for check the ip's  location by curl where the infomation from some Well-known websites  .
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: unix/linux shell for check the ip's  location by Well-known web site .
